page.title: 19DOOR TO DOOR SELLING:CANNICH
page.content: There is one local{shop}which is a licenced grocers and which sells newspapers, household goods and calor gas; it is also the local post office. Grocery{vans,}fishmongers and bakers vans regularly travel throughout the area selling at residents' doors. People living in Cannich area usually {trade}in the nearby towns once a week at most and buy their daily necessities from the local shop or one of the vans. Larger items are usually purchased in Inverness or nearby, while some residents purchase through {Mail Order}catalogues. A travelling {library}visits the area once a month. No{newspaper}is produced in the immediate vicinity of Cannich; news- papers are printed in Inverness and Aberdeen.
